tool.name: crossValidation
tool.command: run_MultiPEN.sh cross_validation ./ "$expr_levels" "$interaction_network" "$classes" $lambda $n_folds $max_iter && mv MultiPEN-Rankings_lambda${lambda}.txt Rankings.txt && mv MultiPEN_Rankings_lambda${lambda}.mat Rankings.mat && mv MultiPEN-vts_lambda${lambda}.txt vts.txt && mv MultiPEN-Rankings_lambda${lambda}_genes-higher-in-cases.txt Rankings-higherInCases.txt && mv MultiPEN-Rankings_lambda${lambda}_genes-higher-in-control.txt Rankings-higherInControl.txt &&

param.name: interaction_network
param.label: Interaction Network
param.help: Matrix with the interactions, each interaction is of the form: [node, node, interaction_weight]

param.name: max_iter
param.label: Maximum number of iterations for optimisation
param.help: Optional parameter, by default this is set to 100
